title: Public Key Pinning
body: Please add support for the Public-Key-Pins HTTP header so that we can pin public keys.

comments.body: Bad news: Chrome unshipped this recently in M69

-1
Chrome intends to unship it as of M69

https://developer.microsoft.com/en-us/microsoft-edge/platform/status/publickeypinningextensionforhttp/ erroneously indicates that Firefox doesn't support HPKP; however, it's been supported for a long time.

This feature is already supported in Mozilla Firefox 35
https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/Security/Public_Key_Pinning
